Text:
OK, the last one this season and the last one from me until after christmas.
Merry Christmas to you all.
Thanks, and same tou you !!!

Thxs Mr-Fear!

Merry christmas and a happy new year to you and your family.
SOMEBODY HELP. HOW TO UPLOAD? PLEASE
Thx Mr_Fear and same to you!!
Thanks!!

Merry X-mas MR_Fear , and
A happy New Year !!

Thanks again!
Merry Chrismas and a happy new year.
Merry Chrismas, Mr_Fear.  :)

Mr_Fear quality 58% is very questionable... are you sure it's OK??
Merry xmas.

Kan du hjälpa mig?

Jag behöver veta hur jag får med subtitlarna, framförallt svenskan. Det här kan jag: Laddar ner filerna, öppnar Nero smart, väljer DVD, väljer alla filer, trycker nästa, nästa och nästa. Bränner skivan. Problemet är när jag tittar på den vanliga DVD-spelaren så kommer menyerna upp för att välja film men det går inte att trycka på någonting, spolar framåt och där utan någon text. Textmenyn visar sig inte alls. Hur gör jag?
...Merry Crhristmas and Happy New Year :).....Mr_Fear,thank you very much for uploading this series..
Mr_Fear, I fear you disappeared... Do you ever plan season 5 onwards? ;)
thanks mr_fear, looking forward to your return
My biggest fear is?. that?s no fear here who hear. ;\
I hope you will be back Mr_Fear.
Me too. I'm desperately waiting for the next season! ;)

All i can say is thanks for all the msg you people sent to me, i really have got a lot of fans out there i see.
But for those of you waiting, here is the answer i have given all that asked when i'll be back:
"I will continue with the remaining DVDs late January, so no worries ;)
Been away on a while, but now i'm back for some more seeding for you people...

"
We all love you , Mr_Fear ... Welcome Back
hope you had a fun vacation somewhere sunny!  great to see you back

Mr_Fear thanks again =). You're awesome man, keep up the good work ;). Heard you planed to start uploading the VOY-series after TNG is finished? Would be VERY appreciated =).

And WELCOME BACK!
Good to have you back....
oh ye Mr_Fear are here, blessed be thei....
Looking forward to S5-S7 :) I'll be happy to keep seeding them onwards. Thanks to everyone that still keeps s1-s4 available.
Its pretty damn late January now isnt it? Come on! Please upload the rest!

2 sambomAdHatTer: Come on man, a little respect...! And patience.
2 Mr_Fear: did you mean... THIS January? ;-)

Ive got alot of respect of Mr_Fear and i am very glad he is taking the time to upload this awsome serie. But he should expect such comments if he is setting at date to upload the rest and dont. Im NOT disrespecting MR_Fear.
Forget this. Go here for 90% quality: http://thepiratebay.org/search/star%20trek%20the%20next%20generation/0/0/0
